tool_description: We support different Sports. Bettings odds, livescores, rankings and match details included. Sports include Football, Tennis, Basketball, Crikcet, Futsal, Handball, Baseball, Table Tennis, Esports. Try it out and always feel free tor reach out to the team to add more endpoints!
title: Sports Live Scores

api_list.name: Tennis Rankings
api_list.description: Returns ATP or WTA Standings for a given number of players.

required_parameters.name: n_players
required_parameters.description: Number of players to be displayed. Max: 1000.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-live-scores.p.rapidapi.com/tennis/rankings/{category}/{n_players}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-live-scores.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Handball Match Statistics
api_list.description: Returns Statistics about a given match_id. The match does not have to be necessarily live but also finished. You can retrieve Match IDs from the Handball Live Matches endpoint.

required_parameters.name: match_id
required_parameters.description: You can retrieve Match IDs from the Handball Live Matches endpoint.

api_list.code:

url = "https://sports-live-scores.p.rapidapi.com/football/match_details/{match_id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-live-scores.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
